channel.title: Distribution Morphing versus ISO Installation Method Differences?
channel.description: Is there any difference between the debian morph and kicksecure from the iso aside from the process of installing? I could try that if it is going to take a while to fix.

item.title: Distribution Morphing versus ISO Installation Method Differences?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Bob:

Is there any difference between the debian morph and kicksecure from the iso aside from the process of installing?

Any differences are documented on the distribution morphing, Install Kicksecure inside Debian wiki page.

Read full topic
item.source: Distribution Morphing versus ISO Installation Method Differences?
